text: Ara niscaya'i tomadera kache era age i'usupha esechilena spasta pramanabali niye, kinta tomara barabara sandehera madhye chile tini ya niye tomadera kache esechilena se-sanbandhe. Kinta yakhana tini mrtubarana karalena takhana tomara balale -- 'allah kakhano tamra pare kono rasula damra karabena na.â€™ E'ibhabe'i allah pathabhrasta hate dena take ye sbayam amitacari, sandehabhajana
